name: Splitsville
description:
The Dreaded 7 - 10 Split.....

AND THEY'RE EVERYWHERE!!

You won't be able to destroy these pins with a ball alone. Blast these unfortunate leftovers into each other and set off chain reactions for maximum carnage.

Aim for that Perfect Game!! Destroy all 60 Pins!!

HOW TO PLAY:

CLICK AND DRAG BACK to BOWL THE BALL.

No need to wait for the ball to return to you here.

BOWL AWAY whenever you care to do so.

You have 15 FRAMES (30 THROWS)

GOOD LUCK
